attributes.action: help to create a "one stop shop" for access to public services (such as council services, police, social and affordable housing bodies, health services and including a post office) in every village and in every ward of towns and cities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the moment it is upto each service to decide how they are accessible to the public resulting in fragmentation and duplication of premises. The "top down" apprach will see that every citizen has a single place that is local to them to deal with public bodies whether for a service, advice, assistance or to comment. It will also serve as an affordable way for every community to have a post office without fear of closure.
